welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Antonio! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city, known for its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you'll explore and enjoy everything our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Baler Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for VIP guests and offers a more luxurious travel experience.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments, ensuring efficient and safe transport of goods.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi access throughout the airport.
